item.title: 沙特公布 2034 年世界杯足球赛体育场计划
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯计划为 2034 年男足世界杯准备好 15 座足球场，因为该国准备在未来几个月内正式宣布成为东道主。【原文：Saudi Arabia plans to have 15 football stadiums ready for the men’s FIFA World Cup 2034, as the country prepares to be officially announced as the host in the coming months.】

item.title: 马士基在供应链中断情况下上调全年业绩预期
item.description: 作为全球贸易的风向标，A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S上调了全年指导目标，原因是红海袭击事件后供应链持续中断导致运费上涨。【原文：A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S, a bellwether for global trade, increased its full year guidance due to higher freight rates caused by continued supply chain disruptions following attacks in the Red Sea.】

item.title: 币安季度反弹可能受阻于波动性降温
item.description: 尽管人们预期 Coinbase Global Inc. 的收入和利润将翻一番，但它在发布第二季度财报时有可能成为波动率下降的牺牲品。【原文：Despite expectations for a doubling in revenue and a jump in profit, Coinbase Global Inc. is at risk of falling victim to a drop in volatility when it releases second-quarter results.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯托纳拉斯仍认为 2024 年将再减息两次，以应对经济增长疲软
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲央行可能不得不进一步放宽货币政策，以帮助该地区陷入困境的经济，今年仍有可能再降息两次。【原文：The European Central Bank may have to ease monetary policy further to aid the region’s struggling economy, with two more interest-rate cuts still likely this year, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 苹果和亚马逊财报对纳斯达克 100 指数下一步走势至关重要
item.description: 苹果公司和亚马逊公司的财报对纳斯达克 100 指数的走势至关重要，在此之前，纳斯达克 100 指数波动剧烈，今年曾出现过一些最糟糕和最好的日子。【原文：Earnings from Apple Inc. and Amazon.com Inc. will be critical to give direction to the Nasdaq 100 after a volatile period marked by some of the benchmark’s worst — and best — days this year.】

item.title: 欧洲大型石油公司的利润仍取决于原油
item.description:
随着战争和欧佩克+减产推动价格上涨，黑色食品仍将是核心盈利驱动力。【原文：

With prices driven higher by war and OPEC+ cutbacks, the black stuff is set to remain a core earnings driver.

】

item.title: New York City Pensions Gain 10% in Fiscal Year, Beating Target
item.description: 在美国股市创下历史新高的推动下，纽约市的五家养老金公司在上一财政年度实现了投资目标。【原文：New York City’s five pensions beat investment targets in the last fiscal year, propelled by a record-breaking US stock market.】

item.title: 爱尔兰财政部长签署成立新主权财富基金的命令
item.description: 爱尔兰财政部长杰克-钱伯斯（Jack Chambers）签署了成立该国新主权财富基金的启动令，该基金的规模有可能增长到超过 1,000 亿欧元（1,080 亿美元）。【原文：Irish Finance Minister Jack Chambers signed the commencement order to set up the country’s new sovereign wealth fund with the potential to grow to more than €100 billion ($108 billion).】

item.title: 加拿大鹅凭借亚洲市场的强劲势头和轻便服装提高了销售额
item.description: 加拿大鹅控股公司（Canada Goose Holdings Inc.【原文：Canada Goose Holdings Inc. reported higher-than-expected revenue as its Asian stores boosted sales and it introduced new lightweight products for warmer seasons.】

item.title: 英国央行以 5 比 4 的投票结果下调利率，下一步行动尚无时间表
item.description: 英国央行自 2020 年初以来首次降息，并发出了进一步谨慎降息的信号，在英国一代人以来借贷成本最高的一年之后，为家庭提供了一些宽慰。【原文：The Bank of England cut interest rates for the first time since early 2020 and signaled further cautious reductions ahead, offering some relief to households after a year of the UK’s highest borrowing costs for a generation.】

item.title: 限量版车型推动需求增长，法拉利上调指导目标
item.description: 法拉利公司（Ferrari NV）上调了全年业绩展望，原因是客户定制和限量版汽车（如价值 220 万美元的 Daytona SP3）出货量的增加提高了第二季度的利润。【原文：Ferrari NV raised its full-year outlook as customization and higher shipments of limited-edition cars like the $2.2 million Daytona SP3 boosted profit in the second quarter.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行获得关键性批准，距离加拿大银行执照越来越近
item.description: 西班牙桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）多年来一直在努力拓展加拿大市场，并获得了一项关键性批准。【原文：Banco Santander SA won a key approval in its years-long effort to expand in Canada, where the Spanish lender has already has a foothold in auto finance.】

item.title: European Banks Join Wall Street’s $30 Billion Stock-Trading Haul
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）和法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）也加入了股票交易大潮，今年到目前为止，这两家大银行已获得超过 300 亿美元的收入。【原文：Barclays Plc and Societe Generale SA joined in the stock-trading bonanza that’s helped big banks reap more than $30 billion in revenue so far this year.】

item.title: JLR 旗下塔塔汽车公司因豪华 SUV 销售而实现超预期利润
item.description: 捷豹路虎印度母公司公布的季度利润超过预期，原因是其豪华运动型多功能车销售强劲。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover’s Indian parent reported quarterly profit that beat estimates on strong sales of its luxury sport utility vehicles.】

item.title: 希腊扑灭克里特岛大火，强风加剧风险
item.description: 希腊当局下令疏散雅典以南 27 公里（17 英里）的海滩度假胜地 Agia Marina 的部分居民，因为周四一场大火威胁到了房屋。【原文：Greek authorities ordered the evacuation of part of the beach resort of Agia Marina, 27 kilometers (17 miles) south of Athens, after a fire threatened houses on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿波罗未达预期，雅典娜保险部门利润下滑
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. reported second-quarter results that missed Wall Street estimates as higher fees failed to offset declining profits at its Athene annuities business.】

item.title: 计划今年在哥伦比亚开采世界上最深的海上油井
item.description: 石油行业正在挑战近海勘探的极限，计划几个月内在哥伦比亚钻探一口创纪录的深水井。【原文：The oil industry is pushing the limits of offshore exploration with plans to drill a record-setting deepwater well in Colombia within months.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储发出信号，可能在 9 月份降息，Meta 的财报显示人工智能投资正在获得回报。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The Fed signals a cut may come in September and Meta’s earnings indicate AI investments are paying off. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 欧盟拒绝匈牙利就卢克石油公司过境禁令举行会议的请求
item.description: 欧盟拒绝了匈牙利和斯洛伐克提出的就乌克兰禁止俄罗斯一个主要供应国的原油过境的决定进行紧急磋商的请求。【原文：The European Union rejected a request by Hungary and Slovakia for urgent consultation over a decision by Ukraine to ban transit of crude oil from a major Russian supplier.】

item.title: 消费疲软影响前景，Worldline 跌至历史最低点
item.description: 在这家法国支付处理商以欧洲消费疲软为由下调全年业绩指导后，Worldline SA 跌至历史最低点。【原文：Worldline SA tumbled to a record low after the French payments processor reduced full-year guidance, citing weak consumption in Europe.】

item.title: 美国就业市场的大流行使衰退信号面临考验
item.description: 预测劳动力市场下滑从来都不是一件容易的事。但是，大流行后的独特动态使经济学家更难判断最近失业率的上升是否预示着未来的麻烦。【原文：Predicting a labor-market downturn was never an easy task. But unique post-pandemic dynamics are making it even harder for economists to determine whether a recent uptick in the unemployment rate is signaling trouble ahead.】

item.title: 意大利箱包制造商 Furla 开始正式债务重组谈判
item.description: 意大利手袋制造商 Furla SpA 在经历多年亏损后，已开始与其贷款人进行正式的债务重组谈判。【原文：Italian handbag maker Furla SpA has kicked off formal debt restructuring talks with its lenders after years of losses.】

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，河内为暴雨做好准备，洪水造成 3 人死亡
item.description: 越南快报》（VnExpress）新闻网站周四援引当地政府的话报道称，越南北部准备迎接更多的暴雨，因为洪水淹没了街道，山体滑坡已在河内造成至少三人死亡。【原文：North Vietnam prepared for more heavy rain amid flooded streets and landslides that have caused at least three deaths in Hanoi, VnExpress news website reported on Thursday, citing local authorities.】

item.title: 需求疲软抵消能源成本上涨，巴基斯坦通胀放缓
item.description: 巴基斯坦中央银行四年来首次多次下调政策利率，消费者需求放缓的影响抵消了能源价格的上涨，因此巴基斯坦 7 月份的通胀速度有所放缓。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation pace slowed in July as the impact of slowing consumer demand offset hikes in energy prices after the central bank eased its policy rate for the first time in four years with multiple cuts.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司因机场和矿业收入而利润激增 115
item.description: 随着亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的旗舰公司从去年空头的猛烈攻击中反弹，阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd.）在一些新业务的推动下，季度利润猛增 115%。股价上涨。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd. posted a 115% jump in quarterly profit, boosted by some of its newer businesses as billionaire Gautam Adani’s flagship rebounds from a scathing short seller attack last year. Shares rose.】

item.title: 印度农作物将在季风剩余时间里迎来更多降雨
item.description: 印度重要季风期剩余时间的降雨量预计将高于季节平均水平，有助于农民提高大米和大豆的产量。【原文：Rainfall over the remainder of India’s vital monsoon period is expected to be above the seasonal average, helping efforts by farmers to boost production of rice to soybeans.】

item.title: 南非将在年底前公布拟议的新财务规则
item.description: 南非国家财政部表示，期待已久的国家金融市场法规修改即将完成，并计划在年底前公布修改建议，征求意见。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury said it is close to finalizing long-awaited changes to the nation’s financial markets regulations, and plans to publish proposed amendments for comment by the end of the year.】

item.title: 日本制药商协和麒麟以 1 亿美元出售中国业务
item.description: 日本制药商 Kyowa Kirin Co. 将以 150 亿日元（1 亿美元）的价格将其中国业务出售给香港的一家公司，以重组其在亚太地区的业务，推动增长。【原文：Kyowa Kirin Co. will sell its China business to a company in Hong Kong for ¥15 billion ($100 million), as the Japanese drugmaker restructures its business in the broader Asia Pacific region to drive growth.】

item.title: 贝伦贝格称 BBVA 将在收购萨瓦德尔时裁员 3,700 人
item.description: 贝伦贝格公司（Berenberg）分析师迈克尔-克里斯托多鲁（Michael Christodoulou）认为，BBVA 在接管萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）后，如果想实现关键的节约目标，将需要裁员 3700 人。【原文：BBVA would need to eliminate 3,700 jobs after taking over Banco Sabadell SA if it wants to hit a key savings target, according to Berenberg analyst Michael Christodoulou.】

item.title: 首席执行官们在盈利电话会议上讨论美联储问题的速度创下新高
item.description: 对于试图把握降息时机的全球投资者来说，美联储是本周的热门话题。美联储也是美国企业财报后电话会议的一个重要议题。【原文：The Federal Reserve is a hot topic this week for global investors trying to time interest-rate cuts. It’s also — unusually — a prominent feature on Corporate America’s post-earnings conference calls.】
